Berserker.description: The Berserker is a champion nordic warrior, reported to have a nearly uncontrollable power when he feels his life coming to his end.

Warrior.description: The Warrior is always fighting for his honor and for helping people in need.

Assassin.description: The Assassin basically kills people because he likes the taste of the blood and seeing his victims suffering

Wizard.description: The Wizard fights evil using his magical powers.
